description: This table contains home care place of service information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the level of care changes for a hospice patient


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Routine Home Care


Continuous Home Care


Inpatient Respite Care


General Inpatient Care


Routine Home Care (Days 61+)

columns.name: HOME_CARE_POS_DT
columns.description: This item tracks a starting date for the place of service of a home care patient.

columns.name: PLACE_OF_SERVICE_ID
columns.description: EAF ID of the place of service for a home care episode.

columns.name: POS_ADDRESS
columns.description: Street address of the home care place of service

columns.name: POS_CITY
columns.description: This item tracks the city of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the state of the home care patient's place of service


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POS_ZIP
columns.description: This item tracks the zip code of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the type of location for a home care patient's place of service. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Telehealth - Provided in Patient's Home


Office


Home


Assisted Living Facility


Group Home


Mobile Unit


Temporary Lodging


Walk-in Retail Health Clinic


Place of Employment - Worksite


Off Campus - Outpatient Hospital


Urgent Care Facility


Inpatient Hospital


On Campus - Outpatient Hospital


Emergency Room - Hospital


Ambulatory Surgical Center


Birthing Center


Military Treatment Facility


Skilled Nursing Facility


Nursing Facility


Custodial Care Facility


Hospice


Adult Living Care Facility


Ambulance - Land


Ambulance - Air or Water


Independent Clinic


Federally Qualified Health Center


Inpatient Psychiatric Facility


Psychiatric Facility - Partial Hospitalization


Community Mental Health Center


Intermediate Care Facility/ Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities


Residential Substance Abuse Treatment Facility


Psychiatric Residential Treatment Center


Non-residential Substance Abuse Treatment Facility


Non-residential Opioid Treatment Facility


Mass Immunization Center


Comprehensive Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility


Comprehensive Outpatient Rehabilitation Facility


End-Stage Renal Disease Treatment Facility


Public Health Clinic


Rural Health Clinic


Independent Laboratory


Other Place of Service


Pharmacy


Telehealth - Provided Other than in Patient's Home


School


Homeless Shelter


Indian Health Service Free-standing Facility


Indian Health Service Provider-based Facility


Tribal 638 Free-standing Facility


Tribal 638 Provider-based Facility


Prison/Correctional Facility

columns.name: POS_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item tracks free text comments about the place of service and/or hospice level of care.

columns.name: POS_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the user who last edited this line of the place of service or level of care.

columns.name: POS_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: This item tracks the instant at which this place of service entry was last edited.

columns.name: HSPC_ROOM_BOARD_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether or not room and board charges should be generated for this place of service entry.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: POS_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the department for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: POS_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the county of the home care patient's place of service


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POS_COUNTRY_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column tracks the country category value for a home care patient's place of service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POS_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: This column tracks the house number for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: POS_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column tracks the district category value for a home care patient's place of service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LATITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded latitude of the place of service address in decimal degrees with up to 6 decimals of accuracy.

columns.name: LONGITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded longitude for the place of service address with 6 decimals of precision.

columns.name: GEO_RATING
columns.description: The GEO_RATING rates the accuracy of latitude and longitude for a given place of service address.
